name: Totemori 2D
description:
Totemori 2D is an tounge-in-cheek sequel to Totemori.

In this game you'll be stacking boulders in order to build towers higher and faster than your opponents.

Why on earth would one develop a 2D retro sequel to 3D game? Check out the devlog to find out :D

Be sure to get involved, leave a comment below or send me a tweet!

Follow me on Twitter! Chime in on TIGForums Controls
  • Player one - Arrow keys
  • Player two - WSAD

As of know, XBox360 controllers are supported. 

Releases

At the moment, a playable demo is available to showcase the core mechanics and some content for the game. At the moment I'm not actively developing this game, but I might revisit it at some point.
